faq.question: How does Voice AI work for Charlotte businesses?
faq.answer: Our AI voice agents answer your business phone calls just like a trained receptionist. They can answer questions about your services, qualify leads by asking specific questions, book appointments directly into your calendar, and route urgent calls to you. The AI works 24/7, so you never miss a call from Charlotte customers, even outside business hours.

faq.question: What types of Charlotte businesses benefit most from Voice AI?
faq.answer: Service businesses in Charlotte see the biggest impact: contractors, HVAC companies, plumbers, electricians, medical practices, law firms, real estate agents, and home service providers. Any Charlotte business that gets phone leads and can't afford to miss calls will benefit significantly from Voice AI technology.

faq.question: How much does Voice AI cost for my Charlotte business?
faq.answer: Our Voice AI packages start at $997/month, which includes setup, custom training, unlimited calls, and ongoing optimization. Most Charlotte businesses see positive ROI within 30 days as they capture leads they were previously missing and save on staffing costs.

faq.question: Can the AI handle Charlotte-specific questions?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We train your AI with your specific business information, including service areas in Charlotte (South End, Myers Park, Ballantyne, University area, Uptown, SouthPark, etc.), pricing, availability, and common questions your Charlotte customers ask. The AI represents your business accurately.

faq.question: How quickly can we get Voice AI set up?
faq.answer: Most Charlotte businesses are live with Voice AI within 5-7 business days. This includes strategy consultation, AI training with your business information, testing, and launch. We handle all the technical setup - you just need to provide your business details.

faq.question: What happens to calls the AI can't handle?
faq.answer: If the AI encounters a question it can't answer or the caller requests to speak with a person, the call is immediately transferred to you or your team. You maintain full control and can monitor all calls in real-time through our dashboard.
